message:
You are working on Pull Request #79 in repository sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes. You need to resolve the remaining comments from reviewers.
Use the GitHub API with the GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable to retrieve the PR details.
Check out the branch from that pull request and look at the diff versus the base branch of the PR to understand the PR's intention.
Then use the GitHub API to retrieve all the feedback on the PR so far.
If anything hasn't been addressed, address it and commit your changes back to the same branch.
